missingApiKey.title: Missing Shopify API Key
missingApiKey.children: Your app is running without the SHOPIFY_API_KEY environment variable. Please ensure that it is set when running or building your React app.

missingHost.title: Missing host query argument
missingHost.children: Your app can only load if the URL has a host argument. Please ensure that it is set, or access your app using the Partners Dashboard Test your app feature

notFound.heading: There is no page at this address
notFound.content: Check the URL and try again, or use the search bar to find what you need.
